Our shower gel formula is full of natural, moisturising ingredients, lathering you in bubbles without harming the planet.

Plus, it's vegan and cruelty-free, so you can feel amazing everytime you shower.

settings.title: Shower Gel Base Ingredients 📦
settings.content:
These are the natural ingredients which make up the base of our shower gels. We then add a combination of fragrance to create the Wild scents you love.

💦 Water (Aqua)
It’s a solvent meaning it dissolves the other ingredients so they can mix together.

🥥 Cocamidopropyl Betaine
This comes from the fatty acids of coconut oil and is great at gently washing the skin and creating a glorious lather.

🧲 Sarkosyl (Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate)
Acts like a magnet both to help oil based and water based ingredients blend together and pull sebum and dirt from the skin.

🍊 Citric Acid
A naturally occurring acid from citrus fruit that is used as a preservative.

🍄 Benzoate of Soda (Sodium Benzoate)
Another preservative that stops the growth of fungi, yeasts and bacteria.

🐜 Potassium Sorbate
A preservative to stop the growth of microorganisms in your shower gel.

💪 Sodium Gluconate
Prevents the discolouration of the shower gel over time.

🧂 Salt (Sodium Chloride)
Makes the shower gel the perfect thickness for lathering over your skin.

🛀 Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride
A skin conditioner to keep your skin smooth and soft.

settings.title: Looking for ingredients for a specific scent?
settings.content:
Each shower gel is made from our base ingredients plus a combination of fragrances.

Below you can see the fragrance components that are considered allergens. If there are no items listed, the fragrance contains no allergens.

Fresh Cotton & Sea Salt 🌊
Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Glycerin, Citric Acid, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Gluconate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Linalool.

Jasmine & Mandarin Blossom 💐
Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Glycerin, Citric Acid, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Gluconate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral.

Coconut & Vanilla 🥥
Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Glycerin, Citric Acid, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Gluconate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Hexyl Cinnamal, Coumarin.

settings.title: Soap Ingredients 📦
settings.content:
Fresh Cotton & Sea Salt Soap 🌊
Sodium Palmate, Aqua (Water), Sodium Palm Kernelate, Glycerin, Parfum (Fragrance), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Oil, Kaolin, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Citrate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, CI 77007 (Ultramarines), Silica, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Coumarin, Limonene, Linalool.

Coconut & Vanilla Soap 🥥
Sodium Palmate, Aqua (Water), Sodium Palm Kernelate, Glycerin, Parfum (Fragrance), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Oil, Kaolin, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Citrate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Aluminium Hydroxide, CI 73360 (Red 30 Lake), CI 77007 (Ultramarines), CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), Silica, Benzyl Salicylate, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal.

Jasmine & Mandarin Blossom Soap 💐
Sodium Palmate, Aqua (Water), Sodium Palm Kernelate, Glycerin, Parfum (Fragrance), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Oil, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Citrate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Aluminium Hydroxide, CI 73360 (Red 30 Lake), CI 77007 (Ultramarines), Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool.

settings.title: Shampoo Bar Ingredients 📦
settings.content:
Fresh Cotton & Sea Salt 🌊
Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Aqua (Water), Polyglyceryl-4 Laurate, Erythritol, Glycerin, Myristyl Lactate, Parfum (Fragrance), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Decyl Glucoside, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Coumarin, Limonene, Linalool.

Coconut & Vanilla 🥥
Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Aqua (Water), Polyglyceryl-4 Laurate, Erythritol, Glycerin, Myristyl Lactate, Parfum (Fragrance), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Decyl Glucoside, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Benzyl Salicylate, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal.

Jasmine & Mandarin Blossom 💐
Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Aqua (Water), Polyglyceryl-4 Laurate, Erythritol, Glycerin, Myristyl Lactate, Parfum (Fragrance), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Decyl Glucoside, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool.
